## name.required

```
Package name is not defined!

Use:

  qpackage <name>
    -n <name>
    -e <email>
    -g <github login>
    -c <copyright>
    -d <description>
```

## output.exists

```
Directory «{{outputDir}}» already exists!
```

## success.created

```
Package «{{name}}» created successfully!
```
